name: Don't Pop the Balloon (Devora Studios)
description:
A game made during LDJam April 2020, I started late, only getting 12 hours or so of work,  so I didn't have much time to work on a cool mechanic or interesting level ideas, unfortunately, so I just tried making a full game.

Play as a balloon and make your way to the kid who lost you!

Movement: 

Arrow keys to move

Space to brake

Menu Select: Space

Go to Menu: Escape
